title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Business Strategy: Skill-Enhanced Exploration for Neonatal Exudate Injury Prevention and Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic neonatal nursing knowledge and experience in intravenous (IV) therapy management
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major causes and prevention strategies for neonatal exudate injury.
Learners can identify early signs of exudate injury with 80% accuracy through virtual scenario analysis.
Learners can perform appropriate management procedures step-by-step in a simulation environment when exudate occurs.
Learners can apply critical thinking-based problem-solving approaches using technology-enhanced learning tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
